response.overview: Active development of the capital of Kazakhstan took place in 2014. Ordinary people instantly lost the dream of their own home; more than 50 ordinary families became victims of scammers and found themselves without a roof over their heads. The fraudster embezzled the shareholders’ money and disappeared, leaving the country. Shareholders, realizing the scale of the problem, united and began their fight against the system. Many attempts to transfer housing cooperatives to other construction companies, tense and lost court cases, rallies at the Ministry of Internal Affairs, corruption and pain do not stop our heroes and they are about to achieve their goal...
response.title: Square Meters
